name: src/ajax-adapter.js
src/store.js
attr
description: Creates a field definition for an attribute.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the property to map this field from.

name: hasOne
description: Creates a field definition for an has-one relationship.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the property to map this field from.

name: hasMany
description: Creates a field definition for an has-many relationship.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the property to map this field from.

name: add
description:
Add an individual resource to the store. This is used internally by the
`push()` method.

name: convert
description: Converts the given partial into a JSON API compliant representation.

params.name: type
params.description: The type of the resource. This can be omitted if the partial includes a type property.

params.name: id
params.description: The id of the resource. This can be omitted if the partial includes an id property.

return.description: JSON API version of the object.

name: create
description:
Attempts to create the resource through the adapter and adds it to  the
store if successful.

params.name: partial
params.description: Data to create the resource with.

name: destroy
description:
Attempts to delete the resource through the adapter and removes it from
the store if successful.

name: find
description:
Find a resource or entire collection of resources.

NOTE: If the resource hasn't been loaded via an add() or push() call it
will be automatically created when find is called.

params.name: type
params.description: Type of the resource(s) to find.

params.name: id
params.description:
The id of the resource to find. If omitted all
                       resources of the type will be returned.

return.description: Either the resource or an array of resources.

name: load
description:
Attempts to load the resource(s) through the adapter and adds it/them to
the store if successful.

params.name: options
params.description: **NOT YET IMPLEMENTED** (this will include sorting, filtering and pagination options)

name: off
description: Unregister an event listener that was registered with on().

params.name: type
params.description: Name of resource to originally passed to on().

params.name: id
params.description: ID of the resource to originally passed to on().

params.name: id
params.description: ID of the resource to watch.

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to call when the event occurs.

params.name: context
params.description: Context in which to call the callback.

name: push
description:
Add a JSON API response to the store. This method can be used to handle a
successful GET or POST response from the server.

params.name: root
params.description:
Top Level Object to push. See:
                           http://jsonapi.org/format/#document-top-level

name: remove
description: Remove a resource or collection of resources from the store.

params.name: type
params.description: Type of the resource(s) to remove.

params.name: id
params.description:
The id of the resource to remove. If omitted all
                       resources of the type will be removed.

name: update
description:
Attempts to update the resource through the adapter and updates it in  the
store if successful.

params.name: partial
params.description: Data to update the resource with.
